description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Phang-nga, Thailand. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Contemporary Khao Lak Resort Escape Steps from Bangsak Beach
hotels.description: If you have your heart set on an absolute beachfront retreat, Outrigger Khao Lak Beach Resort, located mere steps from the azure waters of the Andaman Sea, will fulfil your every wish. Watch the waves lap against Bangsak Beach while indulging in a fusion feast at Edgewater Restaurant & Bar. Tap in to your vacation spirit with a float in the infinity pool and an open-air Thai massage, or fully immerse yourself in Khao Lak's adventuring spirit with a yoga or Thai boxing class - you can't go wrong.

seo.title: Hoteles en Phang-nga - Tailandia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Phang-nga, Thailand con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
